page.title: 07Employment in Wolverhampton
page.content:
survey of employment was done in our class at St Peter's School.It showed that nearly every parent does a different job.There are some with simple jobs such as cleaners and others such as company directors.The most common job was being a secretary and people who were self employed.The most unusual jobs were a vicar,a teacher and one person described as a knitter.There were jobs such as cashiers and carpenters and drivers. We found out that lots of parents were working for hospitals in different ways. By Sarah Perry and Mandy Wagstaffe
